name: Pandarama: The Lost Toys
description: An exciting puzzle-arcade game about the adventures of tireless Panda Pew!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: CPU 1700 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 210 or similar videocard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: CPU 2400 MHz Graphics: GeForce 210 or similar videocard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
